title: Anyone know where to find replays?
body: I know now that Replays save automatically I think? Was wondering if anyone can help me out on this. Thanks

replies.body: Go to your match history in the client, there should be a button to download a replay of the game.
I still use Legacy, will that work?
No it won't unfortunately, it only works on the new client.
Go into your documents > games > League of Legends > Replays This is where mine are found, yours should be in the same spot. If not I don't know where and I can't help you sorry.
